title: Rat Bat
content:
Rat Bat Rare 2~9 Damage 1d8 +1 Bludgeoning Rat Catcher: Attack Rolls against beasts have Advantage. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A club with nails hammered through it. Classic. Greatclub Two-Handed 4.5 190
